Task.Name: Project Planning
Task.Description: Initial project setup including defining project scope, objectives, and detailed planning.

Task.Name: Environment Setup
Task.Description: Setting up development, staging, and production environments with necessary tools and technologies.

Task.Name: Backend Development in Rust
Task.Description: Rewriting the backend APIs from Node.js to Rust, ensuring integration with existing MERN stack.

Task.Name: Frontend Adjustment
Task.Description: Adjusting the frontend to ensure compatibility with the new Rust-based APIs.

Task.Name: Testing and Quality Assurance
Task.Description: Comprehensive testing to identify and resolve any bugs or compatibility issues.

Task.Name: Optimization and Tuning
Task.Description: Performance tuning and optimization with the help of Rust consultants.

Task.Name: Deployment
Task.Description: Deploying the new backend to production environment.

Task.Name: Monitoring and Maintenance
Task.Description: Post-deployment monitoring and maintenance to ensure system stability and performance.
